name: Syllabus
body:
Items 1 to 16 will be covered before midterm exams.

Items 17 to 31 will be covered after midterm exams. 

Items 32, 33 and invited lectures are all independent sessions that will be covered if time permits. The instructor may cover these items any time during the semester. 

Please note: 
Each item presented below doesnâ€™t denote a 50 min class session. They are just the list of topics that we will be covering. While some items might take a meagre 20 mins (eg., item 3 takes less than 20 mins) some of them may take more than 2 to 3 classes (eg., item 31 takes 2 hours or more to cover).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
